text: Thura U Tun Tin (, ; 2 October 1920 - 1 May 2020) was an Burmese politician. Tin served as the 9th Prime Minister of Burma for a few months in 1988. He was born in Myitkyina on 2 October 1920. He studied at Mandalay College in 1941. Tin died on 1 May 2020 in Yangon at the age of 99.R I P ဗိုလ်မှူးကြီးသူရ (ဦး)ထွန်းတင် ==References== Category:1920 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Prime Ministers of Myanmar
title: Tun Tin
